rest.ftp

Class GetRestRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • rest.ftp.GetRestRequest

  • public class GetRestRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which only contains two static method used to send a GET or a RETR Request to a FTPServer
    Author:
    cachera - falez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GetRestRequest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDirectory(FTPSession session, RestRequestInformation information)
      Send a LIST Request to the FTP Server for the directory designed by session uri and return a HTML page by default or other format as a byte array containing the list of the folder's files
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile> getDirectoryList(org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile[] ftpFiles, RestRequestInformation information)
      Return an ordered list of files contained in a directory asked by the URI.
      static javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFile(FTPSession session, RestRequestInformation information)
      Send a RETR Request to the FTP Server for the file designed by session uri and return the file as a byte array to be download

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public GetRestRequest()

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFile(FTPSession session,
                                RestRequestInformation information)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                FTPBadAnswerException
        Send a RETR Request to the FTP Server for the file designed by session uri and return the file as a byte array to be download
        Parameters:
        session - The session which send the RETR Request
        information - Information about the FTP Request
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the file if it's found, null otherwise
        Throws:
        FTPBadAnswerException
        java.io.IOException

      • getDirectory

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDirectory(FTPSession session,
                                     RestRequestInformation information)
        Send a LIST Request to the FTP Server for the directory designed by session uri and return a HTML page by default or other format as a byte array containing the list of the folder's files
        Parameters:
        session - The session which send the LIST Request
        information - Information about the FTP Request
        Returns:
        A byte array which contains HTML Code to display the directory content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDirectoryList

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile> getDirectoryList(org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile[] ftpFiles,
                                                                                  RestRequestInformation information)
        Return an ordered list of files contained in a directory asked by the URI. The first file is the equivalent of "..", the followings are the folders and it finish with the regular files.
        Parameters:
        ftpFiles - The list of files to order and return
        information - Information about the request asking the files
        Returns:
        An ordered map containing the asked files
